description: This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the provision of cable television services to existing outlets in one office building in the National Capital Region. The requirement includes TV service distribution to 38 existing outlets, with the capability to add or remove outlets on an as and when requested basis, based on operational requirements.

full_summary:
**ACAN: Provision of Cable Television Services for Existing Outlets**
==============================================================

**Reference Number**: 24062-24-367
**Publication Date**: 2024-03-05
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-20T14:00:00
**Announcement Status**: Expired


Overview
--------

The Treasury Board Secretariat of Canada (TBS) intends to award a contract for the provision of cable television services to existing outlets in one office building located in the National Capital Region. This advance contract award notice (ACAN) allows other suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities and express their interest in bidding.

**Scope**

The requirement includes:

* 38 existing outlets for television service distribution
* Capability to add or remove outlets as needed based on operational requirements
* Distribution of television services to each outlet location
* No acceptance of satellite signal or streaming distribution in TBS premises

**Evaluation Criteria**

The evaluation criteria are not applicable in this case, as the contracting officer intends to proceed with the award to a pre-identified supplier if no suitable statement of capabilities are received by the closing date.

**Trade Agreements**

The proposed contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact:

* Lars Norgaard, TBS
* Phone: +1 613 435 5070
* Email: [lars.norgaard@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:lars.norgaard@tbs-sct.gc.ca)

**Document Attachments**

The tender notice and contract documents can be downloaded from the following links:

* [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33400/24-367---acan---english---final-en_1.pdf)
* [French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33400/24-367---acan---french---final-fr.pdf)
